flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Project info:

CPU 16Mhz Atmega 328

84x48 graphic LCD with backlight

IR & Wire photo camera trigger

2x Wire Flash Trigger

onboard light/sound sensor or 2x external sensor

2x digital IN/OUT

timelapes function

onboard RTC clock

onboard buzzer

Video

Photo Galery

Project photos

Firmware source code
